fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Hunt for an item each night.
- Use one of your acquired items at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When someone visits the same target as you, you will collect an item from them depending on the ability they used.
> Investigative abilities give you  **Binoculars:** Perform a (35) Investigator check on someone.
> Killing abilities give you a **Gun:** Deal a Basic attack to someone.
> Protective abilities give you a **Vest:** Grant someone Basic defense for the night.
> Other abilities give you a **Smoke Bomb:** Roleblock someone.
- You can collect more items while using one.
- You may hold up to two of each item.
- You cannot self target.
